Definition: Given a premise and a hypothesis, determine if the hypothesis (second sentence) can be concluded from the premise and assigning it a label among entailment, neutral, or contradiction. Entailment means thats the hypothesis makes sense/follows after the premise. Neutral means that the hypothesis does not follow the premise but also does not contradict the premise. Contradiction means that the hypothesis clearly contradicts the premise.

Positive Examples.input: This church choir sings to the masses as they sing joyous songs from the book at a church. <sep> The church has cracks in the ceiling.
Positive Examples.explanation: Not all churches have cracks in the ceiling.

Positive Examples.input: This church choir sings to the masses as they sing joyous songs from the book at a church. <sep> The church is filled with song.
Positive Examples.explanation: "Filled with song" is a rephrasing of the "choir sings to the masses."

Positive Examples.input: This church choir sings to the masses as they sing joyous songs from the book at a church. <sep> A choir singing at a baseball game.
Positive Examples.explanation: A choir sing some other songs other than book at church during the base play. they cannot see book and play base ball same time.

Negative Examples.input: A land rover is being driven across a river. <sep> A sedan is stuck in the middle of a river.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is false. A land rover and a sedan are different cars, so these sentences cannot be describing the same event. This is a contradiction statement.

Negative Examples.input: A man playing an electric guitar on stage. <sep> A man is performing for cash.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is false. There is no indication that the man is performing for cash. This is a neutral statement.

Negative Examples.input: A blond-haired doctor and her African american assistant looking threw new medical manuals. <sep> A man is eating pb and j.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is false. A doctor and assistant are two people looking through manuals is different than a man is eating a sandwich. This is a contradiction statement.
